title: Back to Work - RestartHer with MS office
description: Empowering women to relaunch their careers after a break with expert-led training, MS Office skills, and career readiness tools — all for just ₹1!

title: HerFreshStart: Scholarships of up to 75% for Mothers Returning to Work
description: This Mother’s Day, empower your comeback — get up to 75% scholarship on top tech programs from Great Learning, exclusively for mothers restarting their careers.
